scripts.update-index: export $(egrep -v '^#' $PWD/.env | xargs); gcloud datastore indexes create $PWD/index.yaml --project=$PROJECT
scripts.deploy: export $(egrep -v '^#' $PWD/.env | xargs); yarn test && gcloud functions deploy niu --env-vars-file .env.yml --trigger-http --runtime nodejs10 --region europe-west1 --project $PROJECT
scripts.deploy:no-test: export $(egrep -v '^#' $PWD/.env | xargs); gcloud functions deploy niu --env-vars-file .env.yml --trigger-http --runtime nodejs10 --region europe-west1 --project $PROJECT
